metadata.title: CVE-2023-5475 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in DevTools in Google Chrome prior to118.0.5993.70 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to bypass discretionary access control via a craftedChrome Extension. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
